def remove_users(tweet):
    tweet = re.sub('(RT\s@[A-Za-z]+[A-Za-z0-9-_]+)', '', tweet) # remove retweet
    tweet = re.sub('(@[A-Za-z]+[A-Za-z0-9-_]+)', '', tweet) # remove tweeted at
    return tweet
